title.rendered: 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package

content.rendered:
Table of Contents

  • Enhance Your Experiences with the 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package
  • Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package

The Golden Triangle of India is a popular tourist circuit that covers three iconic cities in Northern India: Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. This triangular route forms a golden thread connecting some of India’s most renowned historical and cultural landmarks.

Delhi, the capital city, is the starting point of the Golden Triangle. It offers a fascinating blend of ancient history and modernity, with attractions like the Red Fort, Qutub Minar, India Gate, and bustling markets like Chandni Chowk.

Agra, home to the world-famous Taj Mahal. This UNESCO World Heritage Site is a stunning testament to love, built by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal. Agra also boasts other architectural marvels like the Agra Fort and Fatehpur Sikri.

Jaipur,the final destination of the Golden Triangle, known as the Pink City due to its pink-hued buildings. Jaipur is a treasure trove of Rajput history and culture, with attractions like the majestic Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and vibrant markets offering traditional handicrafts.

Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package

Choose our 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package

DAY 1

Arrival in Delhi

  • Arrival in New Delhi, India’s vibrant capital city, renowned for its historical landmarks and cultural diversity.
  • Pickup from the airport and transfer to your hotel in Aerocity.
  • Check in at the hotel and relax after your journey.
  • Have some leasure time.
  • Explore nearby shopping malls or restaurants in Aerocity.
  • Overnight stay in Hotel.

DAY 2

New Delhi Sightseeing

  • After breakfast, embark on a full-day sightseeing tour of Delhi.
  • Visit Qutub Minar, a towering example of Indo-Islamic architecture and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, dating back to the 12th century.
  • Lotus Temple, The Lotus Temple in Delhi is a breathtaking architectural marvel renowned for its serene beauty and as a symbol of unity and peace.
  • Humayun’s Tomb, Humayun’s Tomb in Delhi is a majestic UNESCO World Heritage site that showcases exquisite Mughal architecture and historical significance.
  • India Gate, The India Gate in Delhi stands as a timeless tribute to the valor and sacrifice of Indian soldiers, embodying a symbol of national pride and unity.
  • Akshardham Temple, Akshardham in Delhi is a magnificent temple complex that combines stunning architecture, spiritual serenity, and cultural exhibits, drawing visitors from around the world.
  • Connaught Place, Connaught Place (CP) in Delhi is a vibrant commercial and cultural hub known for its iconic circular structure, bustling markets, and diverse culinary scene.
  • Back to hotel and overnight stay in the Delhi.

DAY 3

Delhi to Agra

  • Travel to Agra, home to the world-famous Taj Mahal.
  • Upon arrival, check-in at the hotel.
  • Visit The Taj Mahal, a wonder of the world, stands as a testament to timeless beauty and architectural brilliance in the heart of India.
  • Visit the Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
  • Explore the local markets of Agra.
  • Overnight Stay at hotel.

DAY 4

Agra to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri

  • Check out from the hotel and drive to Fatehpur Sikri.
  • En route, visit Fatehpur Sikri, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
  • Continue the journey to Jaipur, also known as the Pink City.
  • On arrival check into the hotel, check-in at the hotel and relax.
  • Overnight stay at hotel, spend the night there.

DAY 5

Jaipur Sightseeing

  • After breakfast, embark on a full-day sightseeing tour of Jaipur.
  • Visit the majestic Amber Fort, located on a hilltop.Opt for an early visit to witness the fort’s grandeur against the morning light. Consider an elephant ride for an authentic experience.
  • Explore the intricate architecture and history of the fort. Don’t miss the Sheesh Mahal, a hall of mirrors.
  • Visit the Jantar Mantar,an ancient astronomical observatory and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Marvel at the precision of its instruments.
  • Hawa Mahal, or the “Palace of Winds,” is a stunning architectural marvel in Jaipur, Rajasthan, known for its intricate facade featuring 953 windows designed to allow cool air to circulate throughout the palace
  • End the day with a serene visit to Jal Mahal, a palace set in the middle of Man Sagar Lake. Enjoy the picturesque views.
  • Indulge in a gourmet dinner at a palace-turned-restaurant, serving royal Rajasthani cuisine in a regal setting.

DAY 6

Jaipur to Delhi Departure

  • After breakfast, Checkout from the hotel.
  • Drive back to Delhi.
  • Upon arrival in Delhi, you will be transferred to the airport for your onward journey.

Inclusions

  • Airport Transfers as per our 5 Nights 6 Days The Golden Triangle Tour Package itinerary.
  • Travel by comfortable A/C coach as per the tour itinerary
  • Accommodation in comfortable and convenient hotels on twin sharing basis as mentioned in itinerary.
  • All Meals – Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner (set menu) as mentioned in the itinerary

Exclusions

  • Govt Tax of 5% over and above the Tour Cost mentioned
  • Any increase in Airfare, Visa fees, Airport taxes, Govt Taxes, Fuel Surcharges and any applicability of new taxes from Govt
  • Insurance & Visa Cost.
  • Entrance fees of all sightseeing places to be visited from inside
  • Any up gradation in Airline class or hotel room category.
  • Cost of Air ticket deviation charges
  • Anything specifically not mentioned in the ‘tour price includes’ column

Easy Cancellation
*31 days or more prior to departure date, Initial Booking Amount and additional amount of visa fee will be forfeited (in case visa has been applied).*Between 30–16 days : 75% of total tour cost will be charged as penalty. *Less than 15 days: 100% of total tour cost will be charges as penalty.

High Season
Prices can fluctuate during peak season dates.

Travel Validity
The deal is valid for travel till 30 Sep 2024.

Visa Easy
Visa assistance will be provided by our visa specialist.

Booking Policy
– Initial Booking Amount – 30% per person or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable).24 hours prior to the departure date – 70% of the remaining tour cost.
– For Issuance of the Flight Tickets, we require Full Payment of Airfare.
– Non- Refundable Services in the tour package have to be paid in full at the time of Booking.
– Payment Policy is non-negotiable and has to be paid accordingly.
